key.name: <FONT color='#FFD200' size='15' >Next Item</FONT>\n<FONT size='3'> </FONT>\n<FONT color='#909090'>Selects the next item in the list.
<FONT color='#FFD200' size='15' >Exit</FONT>\n<FONT size='3'> </FONT>\n<FONT color='#909090'>Exits build mode.</FONT>
<FONT color='#FFD200' size='15' >Up a Level</FONT>\n<FONT size='3'> </FONT>\n<FONT color='#909090'>Moves your cursor up one level, letting you place items at higher elevations.</FONT>

<FONT color='#FFD200' size='15' >Collect</FONT>\n<FONT size='3'> </FONT>\n<FONT color='#909090'>Returns the item under your cursor to your inventory. You can only collect items that belong to you.</FONT>

<FONT color='#FFD200' size='15' >Rotate</FONT>\n<FONT size='3'> </FONT>\n<FONT color='#909090'>Rotates the item under your cursor so that it faces a different direction. The item must already be placed.</FONT>
<FONT color='#FFD200' size='15' >Down a Level</FONT>\n<FONT size='3'> </FONT>\n<FONT color='#909090'>Moves your cursor down one level, letting you place items at lower elevations.</FONT>
<FONT color='#FFD200' size='15' >Place Item</FONT>\n<FONT size='3'> </FONT>\n<FONT color='#909090'>Places the currently selected item at your cursor's location.</FONT>
